content: Bash: ls -la /home/jw/code/jat/.claude/sessions/ 2>/dev/null || echo "sessions directory doesn't exist"

Bash: echo "Files in .claude/ (agent-*):" && ls /home/jw/code/jat/.claude/agent-*.txt 2>/dev/null | wc -l && echo "" && echo "Files in .claude/sessions/ (agent-*):" && ls /home/jw/code/jat/.claude/sessions/agent-*.txt 2>/dev/null | wc -l
